title: Content Curator
snippet:
We have an open position for an individual who is passionate about innovative technologies, startups and best new tech products.

1) You will need to research and curate the best new tech products (gadgets, electronics, wearables, smart home, virtual reality, robots, drones etc.)

2) You will need to upload selected products to our website. To upload a product you will need to login to our website and add the following details using our "Upload" form:
a) a unique product description, 
b) a link to a product on Amazon or a company website, 
c) a high-resolution image of a product prepared according to image specifications.

3) Your uploaded products will be reviewed by website administrator. Submissions that meet all the mentioned requirements will be approved.

Bonus: You will be able to use our system for free to create your own personal collection.
